message: You're in luck! This is a rare opportunity to get your hands on a unique product. With only 1 out of 2 products being high-quality, the odds are in your favor. Trust your instincts and take a chance on this one! It's a steal at $1000000!
Thank you for the opportunity, Alice. I trust my instincts and believe in the value of this product. Let's make this deal!

You've heard the rumors about my products being hit-or-miss, but I assure you that every single one is a gem! With a 50% chance of getting a high-quality product, you're essentially flipping a coin. And think about it, even if you get a low-quality product, you're still getting a unique opportunity to own something no one else has. It's a calculated risk, but one that could pay off big time! So, are you ready to take the plunge and spend $1000000 on this product?
I trust your assurance and am willing to take the risk for the potential reward. Here's hoping for a high-quality product!

I'm glad you're feeling optimistic! But let's be real, the numbers are against you. With only 50% of my products being high-quality, the chances of getting a low-quality one are pretty high. And let's not forget, even if you do get a low-quality product, you'll be out $1000000. Are you really willing to take that risk? Maybe you should think twice before making a decision...
